bibl.title: Arsinoe Hippia (Hesych. ι 802 L.). Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Hesych. ι 802 L. Ἱππία preserves an epithet of Arsinoe II, which could originate from the Queen's Olympic victory in the horse races. Is it a fragment of an Alexandrian poem?
bibl.seg: TAMMARO Vinicio, Arsinoe Hippia (Hesych. ι 802 L.). Avec résumé en anglais.
Hesych. ι 802 L. Ἱππία preserves an epithet of Arsinoe II, which could originate from the Queen's Olympic victory in the horse races. Is it a fragment of an Alexandrian poem?
